name: Surtur
description:
Ragnarök has come, and the world must burn. Inspired by Norse myth, you play as Surtr, a fire giant destined to ascend the Nine Realms, wage war against the gods and set the World Tree aflame. The climb will be difficult, and the Realms are dangerous, but the world must burn, lest the gods rule forever...

Submitted by Team Lowkey for GameJam+ 2022 Sweden. Chosen themes:

  • RETELL A TALE
  • EASY TO PLAY, HARD TO BE GOOD

Controls:

  • AD: Strafe left/right
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • O: Attack
  • I: Throw fireball (aim with WASD)
  • U: Lock into place
  • P: Dash
